Welcome to Lagrange!

Lagrange is a minimalist Jekyll theme. The purpose of this theme is to provide a simple, clean, content-focused blogging platform for your personal site or blog. Getting Started

Lagrange Lagrange is a minimalist Jekyll theme for running a personal blog or site for free through Github Pages, or on your own server.
